full_text: 01/06/2008 22:25 5616404420 PAGE 04 Aileen Josephs, P.A. Attorney at Law 515 N. Flagler Drive #300 - Pavilion West Palm Beach, Florida 33401 (561) 802-4119 Fax (561) 640-4420 E-Mail: JosephsA@aol.com http://www.ImmigrationConsult.com http://www.ImmigrationUS.com http://www.MiniMundo.net Aileen Josephs Member of District of Columbia and Florida Bars August 14, 2006 Mr. Barry Krischer State Attorney 401 North Dixie Highway West Palm Beach, Florida 33401 Via Priority Mail with Confirmation 353 7274 RE: FOIA REQUEST Jeffrey EPSTEIN Nov 8, 2007 IT HAS Been over A YEAR and Counsel HAS NOT received this response. Dear Mr. Krischer: Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, 5 USC S 552 et seq. and 8 CFR S 103.8-103.10, I am hereby requesting copies of any and all of the following documents in the possession, custody or control of the State Attorney's office related to the criminal case against Jeffrey Epstein: The complete file in the possession of the State Attorney's office related to this case. 1.) All documents are authorized by 8 CFR S 103.10(b)(1)(v). I do not believe any of the requested documents are exempt from disclosure under 5 USC S 552(b). If it is your position, however, that any of the requested documents are exempt under S 552(b)(1) through (9), then pursuant to S 552(b), "any reasonably segregable portion " of any records containing the information sought are hereby requested. If you believe some records are exempt, please clarify on what basis those records are not available. Counsel will pay for the "actual cost of duplication" of the public records. In light of the nature and importance of the records, for the public interest for fair 07/26/17 Page 47 of 104 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031664

August 14, 2006 Mr. Barry Krischer State Attorney 401 North Dixie Highway West Palm Beach, Florida 33401 Via Priority Mail with Confirmation 353 7274 RE: FOIA REQUEST Jeffrey EPSTEIN
Nov 8, 2007 IT HAS Been over A YEAR and Counsel HAS NOT received this response.

Dear Mr. Krischer: Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, 5 USC S 552 et seq. and 8 CFR S 103.8-103.10, I am hereby requesting copies of any and all of the following documents in the possession, custody or control of the State Attorney's office related to the criminal case against Jeffrey Epstein: The complete file in the possession of the State Attorney's office related to this case. 1.) All documents are authorized by 8 CFR S 103.10(b)(1)(v). I do not believe any of the requested documents are exempt from disclosure under 5 USC S 552(b). If it is your position, however, that any of the requested documents are exempt under S 552(b)(1) through (9), then pursuant to S 552(b), "any reasonably segregable portion " of any records containing the information sought are hereby requested. If you believe some records are exempt, please clarify on what basis those records are not available. Counsel will pay for the "actual cost of duplication" of the public records. In light of the nature and importance of the records, for the public interest for fair
07/26/17 Page 47 of 104 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031664

additional_notes: The document is a letter from Aileen Josephs to Mr. Barry Krischer regarding a FOIA request for documents related to the criminal case against Jeffrey Epstein. The letter is dated August 14, 2006, and has handwritten notes on it. The document is page 47 of 104.
